divs: Sighting DetailsIn St. Charles Mo. My friends and I saw 4 glowing spheres roughly 5 miles in a diamond shape. I saw the orginal when i saw 3 lights and 1 took off to the south and 1 took off to the north. While one stayed hovering. The one that went north then turned around and went south with the other one. The one that stayed hovering was the center peice that i then saw of the 4 creating diamond shape. I then went out back and another flew over my head from the north. It had 2 constant yellow lights and one flashing red. The four out front had a blinking blueish redish yellowish multicolor flashing lights. I then saw a yellow light come up from behind a house to the east and go straight up then head south. The lights are still floating outside. I have attached a short video of the main closest one. It has been hovering for two hours now encounting.
Summary: Four hovering lights due east. Two took off to the south. Saw others scoping.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
